00023 #include "cstddev.h"

00070 class SIM_API cDensityEstBase : public cStdDev
00071 {
00072   public:
00076     enum {
00077         RANGE_INVALID,   // --> needs to be set
00078         RANGE_FIXED,     // --> fixed range (lower,upper)
00079         RANGE_AUTO,
00080         RANGE_AUTOLOWER, // --> will be determined from firstvals[],
00081         RANGE_AUTOUPPER, //        using min and/or max and range_ext_fact
00082         RANGE_NOTSET     // --> not set, but it's OK (cVarHistogram only)
00083     };
00084 
00090     struct Cell
00091     {
00092         double lower;  // lower cell bound (inclusive)
00093         double upper;  // lower cell bound (exclusive)
00094         double value;  // counter (or its estimate)
00095         double relativeFreq;  // value / total
00096         Cell() {lower=upper=value=relativeFreq=0;}
00097     };
00098 
00099   protected:
00100     double rangemin,rangemax;   // range for distribution density collection
00101     long num_firstvals;         // number of "pre-collected" observations
00102                                 // before transform() is performed.
00103     unsigned long cell_under;
00104     unsigned long cell_over;    // for counting observations that fall out of range
00105 
00106     double range_ext_factor;    // the range of histogram is: [min_vals,max_vals] made
00107                                 // range_ext_factor times larger
00108     int range_mode;             // one of RANGE_xxx constants
00109 
00110     bool transfd;
00111     double *firstvals;         // pointer to array of "pre-collected" observations
00112 
00113   protected:
00114     static void plotline (std::ostream& os, const char *pref, double xval, double count, double a);
00115 
00116     // part of merge(); to be implemented in subclasses
00117     virtual void doMergeCellValues(const cDensityEstBase *other) = 0;
00118 
00119   public:
00122 
00126     cDensityEstBase(const cDensityEstBase& r) : cStdDev()
00127             {setName(r.getName());firstvals=NULL;operator=(r);}
00128 
00132     explicit cDensityEstBase(const char *name=NULL);
00133 
00137     virtual ~cDensityEstBase();
00138 
00142     cDensityEstBase& operator=(const cDensityEstBase& res);
00144 
00147 
00148     /* No dup() because this is an abstract class. */
00149 
00153     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00154 
00160     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00161 
00167     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00169 
00172 
00180     virtual void collect(double value);
00181 
00185     virtual void collect(SimTime value) {collect(value.dbl());}
00186 
00193     virtual void merge(const cStatistic *other);
00194 
00198     virtual void clearResult();
00199 
00203     virtual void saveToFile(FILE *) const;
00204 
00208     virtual void loadFromFile(FILE *);
00210 
00213 
00218     virtual void setRange(double lower, double upper);
00219 
00231     virtual void setRangeAuto(int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00232 
00240     virtual void setRangeAutoLower(double upper, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00241 
00249     virtual void setRangeAutoUpper(double lower, int num_firstvals=100, double range_ext_fact=2.0);
00250 
00255     virtual void setNumFirstVals(int num_firstvals);
00257 
00258   protected:
00265     virtual void setupRange();
00266 
00273     virtual void collectTransformed(double value) = 0;
00274 
00275   public:
00276 
00279 
00283     virtual bool isTransformed() const   {return transfd;}
00284 
00291     virtual void transform() = 0;
00293 
00296 
00301     virtual int getNumCells() const = 0;
00302 
00310     virtual double getBasepoint(int k) const = 0;
00311 
00317     virtual double getCellValue(int k) const = 0;
00318 
00326     virtual double getCellPDF(int k) const;
00327 
00332     virtual unsigned long getUnderflowCell() const {return cell_under;}
00333 
00338     virtual unsigned long getOverflowCell() const {return cell_over;}
00339 
00344     virtual Cell getCellInfo(int k) const;
00346 
00349 
00355     virtual double getPDF(double x) const = 0;
00356 
00362     virtual double getCDF(double x) const = 0;
00364 };
